SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM(SELECT c.cart_id, c.post_id, c.option_id, c.quantity, c.price, c.member_id, c.reg_date, c.cart_name, a.loading_img FROM cart c JOIN attached_file a ON c.post_id = a.post_id WHERE a.img_type='U2' AND c.post_id LIKE '${cartVO.postId}%' AND c.member_id = #{cartVO.memberId} AND c.delete_type='N' ORDER BY c.reg_date) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{pagingVO.start } AND #{pagingVO.end }
